CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: On the basis of this result , it has been confirmed that π-π stacking was more effective in PQCDTB than in PCZDTB because of coplanarity of the quinacridone unit that was introduced to the main chain of PQCDTB.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PQCDTB (Polyquinacridone-Containing Dendron-Based Polymer)
2. PCZDTB (Polycarbazole-Containing Dendron-Based Polymer)

These are the names of the two polymers being compared in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph:

1. PQCDTB (Polyquinacridone-Containing Dendron-Based Polymer)
2. PCZDTB (Polycarbazole-Containing Dendron-Based Polymer)

These are the names of the two polymers being compared in the paragraph, and they are the only entities that refer to "Material Name".

| --- |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: On the basis of this result , it has been confirmed that π-π stacking was more effective in PQCDTB than in PCZDTB because of coplanarity of the quinacridone unit that was introduced to the main chain of PQCDTB.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. π-π stacking: This is a type of intermolecular interaction where two adjacent pi (π) orbitals of two molecules are aligned parallel to each other and overlap, resulting in a strong interaction between them.
2. PQCDTB: This stands for "π-quinacridone-containing dibenzo[b,f]azepine-based thermoplastic elastomer". It is a type of polymer material.
3. PCZDTB: This stands for "π-cyclozinc-containing dibenzo[b,f]azepine-based thermoplastic elastomer". It is another type of polymer material.
4. coplanarity: This refers to the arrangement of molecules in a plane or layer, where all the molecules have the same orientation and are in contact with each other.

In the context of the paragraph, the property value entities are used to compare the effectiveness of π-π stacking in two different polymer materials, PQCDTB and PCZDTB, due to the coplanarity of the quinacridone unit in PQCDTB.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. π-π stacking: This is a type of intermolecular interaction where two adjacent pi (π) orbitals of two molecules are aligned parallel to each other and overlap, resulting in a strong interaction between them. The value of this property is the strength of the interaction between the molecules.
2. coplanarity: This refers to the arrangement of molecules in a plane or layer, where all the molecules have the same orientation and are in contact with each other. The value of this property is the degree to which the molecules are arranged in a plane.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| π-π stacking |
| coplanarity |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
